channel.title: My Podcast

channel.itunes:summary: Join host John Doe as he explores a variety of interesting topics in this weekly podcast.
channel.description: Join host John Doe as he explores a variety of interesting topics in this weekly podcast.

item.title: Episode 1: The History of the Internet
item.itunes:author: John Doe
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn about the fascinating history of the internet in this episode of My Podcast
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, host John Doe takes a deep dive into the history of the internet. From its humble beginnings as a military communication network to its current status as a global phenomenon, the internet has come a long way. Tune in to learn more about this amazing technology and its impact on society.
